ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: I know that, but there are lvl 4 spells missing from there.  I need to travel to another town to find it. ... From: Chris Trubiani
ygData.messageBody:
I know that, but there are lvl 4 spells missing from there. I need to
travel to another town to find it.
----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Trubiani <u1607755@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 12:50 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Wizard Spell


> From: "Chris Trubiani" <u1607755@...>
>
> Uh, you can get wizard spells in the wizards guild in Freeport.
>
> Tandeyan, Dark Elf Wizard
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
